item.title: Making an area donator only [pi]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

DSPK base here’s the code i added

public boolean isInDArea() { if (c.isDonator > 1) if(absX > 2583 && absX < 2729 && absY > 3255 && absY < 3343) { return true; } else { c.getPA().startTeleport(3281, 2768, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("You are not a donator, gtfo."); } return false; }

We want it to be, if your not a donator then you get teled somewhere else.
here’s the errror.

src\server\model\players\Player.java:709: int cannot be dereferenced if (c.isDonator > 1) ^ src\server\model\players\Player.java:713: int cannot be dereferenced c.getPA().startTeleport(3281, 2768, 0, "modern"); ^ src\server\model\players\Player.java:714: int cannot be dereferenced c.sendMessage("You are not a donator, gtfo."); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
